images.title: Performance Test Case
images.description: Performance test scenario with two independent graphs, independent auto-ranging y-axes, and common scrolling time-series axis. Test system: Linux, 4.12.14, Intel(R) Core(TM) i7 CPU 860 @2.80GHz and GeForce GTX 670 GPU (NVIDIA driver).

images.title: Performance Chart 1
images.description: Chart performance comparison for popular JavaFX, Java-Swing, C++/Qt and WebAssembly-based implementations: ExtJFX, ChartFx, HanSolo Charts, JFreeChart, JDataViewer, QCustomPlot, Qt-Charts, WebAssembly. The last `Qt Charts` entries show results for 100k data points being updated at 25 Hz.

images.title: Performance for fast updates
images.description: Performance comparison @ 25 Hz update rate.

images.title: Performance for large DataSets
images.description: Performance comparison @ 2 Hz update rate.
